mapper.select: select * from s_board where SEQ_ID>0 order by SEQ_ID desc limit #{page},10
select * from s_board where SEQ_ID>0 and board_title like CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') order by SEQ_ID desc limit #{page},10
select count(*) from s_board where board_title like CONCAT('%',#{key},'%')
select board_title from s_board where BOARD_TITLE like CONCAT(#{key},'%') group by BOARD_TITLE
mapper.update: update s_board set board_viewcounter = board_viewcounter+1 where seq_id=#{seq_id}
